conbody.p: Whether directly using cabal, or indirectly using yesod devel, building your code will always go through the cabal file. If you open the file, you'll see that there is both a library and an executable block. Only one of these is built at a time, depending on the value of the devel flag. If devel is turned on, then the library is built, which is how yesod devel calls your app. Otherwise, the executable is built.
